languages.text: "Задушить в себе желание обладать тем, что никогда тебе не принадлежало — вот стезя следующих Завету. Однако..." {n}Голос Кибеллы остается спокоен, но вы замечаете, как оживились служители культа. Внимание и щедрость Вольного Торговца им явно польстили.{/n} "Кровавая паутина не смеет оскорблять влады{mf|ку|чицу} отказом".

"We must not seek that which is not ours. We must smother our worldly desires. Thus do the Tenets guide us, and thus we follow them. However..." {n}Kibellah's voice remains calm, but you notice a ripple of excitement pass through the other cult members. They are clearly flattered to be the subject of the Rogue Trader's attention and generosity.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web would not dare to cause offence by refusing the Domin."
languages.original_text: "Задушить в себе желание обладать тем, что никогда тебе не принадлежало — вот стезя следующих Завету. Однако..." {n}Голос Кибеллы остается спокоен, но вы замечаете, как оживились служители культа. Внимание и щедрость Вольного Торговца им явно польстили.{/n} "Кровавая паутина не смеет оскорблять влады{mf|ку|чицу} отказом".

traits.locale_text: "We must not seek that which is not ours. We must smother our worldly desires. Thus do the Tenets guide us, and thus we follow them. However..." {n}Kibellah's voice remains calm, but you notice a ripple of excitement pass through the other cult members. They are clearly flattered to be the subject of the Rogue Trader's attention and generosity.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web would not dare to cause offence by refusing the Domin."

"To stifle within yourself the desire to own what was never yours: that is the way of Ahn'shini. However..." {n}Kibellah's voice remains calm but you notice a spark of agitation among the cultists. They are clearly flattered by the Rogue Trader's attention and {mf|his|her} generosity. "The Bloodspun Web would dare not offend our {mf|lord|lady} with a refusal."

"We must not seek that which is not ours. We must smother our worldly desires. Thus do the Tenets guide us, and thus we follow them. However..." {n}Kibellah's voice remains calm, but you notice a ripple of excitement pass through the other cult members. They are clearly flattered to be the subject of the Rogue Trader's attention and generosity.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web would not dare to cause offence by refusing the Domin."

They are clearly flattered to be the subject of the Rogue Trader's attention and generosity.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web would not dare to cause offence by refusing the Domin."

languages.text: « Nous ne devons pas convoiter ce qui ne nous appartient pas. Nous devons étouffer nos désirs matériels. C'est ainsi que les Préceptes nous guident et nous les suivons à la lettre. Cela dit... » {n}Bien que la voix de Kibellah n'ait pas changé d'un iota, vous remarquez une vague d'excitation traverser les autres membres du culte. Ils ont l'air flattés des attentions et de la générosité {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.{/n} « La Toile de Sang ne voudrait pas offenser {mf|le|la} Domin en refusant son offre si généreuse. »
languages.original_text: "We must not seek that which is not ours. We must smother our worldly desires. Thus do the Tenets guide us, and thus we follow them. However..." {n}Kibellah's voice remains calm, but you notice a ripple of excitement pass through the other cult members. They are clearly flattered to be the subject of the Rogue Trader's attention and generosity.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web would not dare to cause offence by refusing the Domin."

traits.locale_text: « Nous ne devons pas convoiter ce qui ne nous appartient pas. Nous devons étouffer nos désirs matériels. C'est ainsi que les Préceptes nous guident et nous les suivons à la lettre. Cela dit... » {n}Bien que la voix de Kibellah n'ait pas changé d'un iota, vous remarquez une vague d'excitation traverser les autres membres du culte. Ils ont l'air flattés des attentions et de la générosité {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}.{/n} « La Toile de Sang ne voudrait pas offenser {mf|le|la} Domin en refusant son offre si généreuse. »

languages.text: «No debemos buscar lo que no nos pertenece. Debemos ahogar nuestros deseos terrenales. Tal es la palabra de la Doctrina, y nosotros la seguimos. No obstante...». {n}La voz de Kibellah permanece en calma, pero ves que una oleada de emoción recorre a los demás miembros del culto. A todas luces, están agradecidos de recibir la atención y generosidad de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n} «La Red Sanguinolenta nunca osaría ofender a nuestr{mf|o|a} Domin oponiéndose a sus deseos».
languages.original_text: "We must not seek that which is not ours. We must smother our worldly desires. Thus do the Tenets guide us, and thus we follow them. However..." {n}Kibellah's voice remains calm, but you notice a ripple of excitement pass through the other cult members. They are clearly flattered to be the subject of the Rogue Trader's attention and generosity.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web would not dare to cause offence by refusing the Domin."

traits.locale_text: «No debemos buscar lo que no nos pertenece. Debemos ahogar nuestros deseos terrenales. Tal es la palabra de la Doctrina, y nosotros la seguimos. No obstante...». {n}La voz de Kibellah permanece en calma, pero ves que una oleada de emoción recorre a los demás miembros del culto. A todas luces, están agradecidos de recibir la atención y generosidad de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n} «La Red Sanguinolenta nunca osaría ofender a nuestr{mf|o|a} Domin oponiéndose a sus deseos».

languages.text: “我们不该寻求不属于我们的东西，我们必须抑制世俗的欲望。教义就是这么要求我们的，我们必须恪守教义，不过……”{n}绮贝菈的声音依然非常平静，但你注意到其他信徒都非常兴奋。很显然，行商浪人赐予他们关注与慷慨，这让他们感到非常荣幸。{/n}“织血罗网不敢拒绝秘者的好意，这是冒犯之举。”
languages.original_text: "We must not seek that which is not ours. We must smother our worldly desires. Thus do the Tenets guide us, and thus we follow them. However..." {n}Kibellah's voice remains calm, but you notice a ripple of excitement pass through the other cult members. They are clearly flattered to be the subject of the Rogue Trader's attention and generosity.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web would not dare to cause offence by refusing the Domin."

traits.locale_text: “我们不该寻求不属于我们的东西，我们必须抑制世俗的欲望。教义就是这么要求我们的，我们必须恪守教义，不过……”{n}绮贝菈的声音依然非常平静，但你注意到其他信徒都非常兴奋。很显然，行商浪人赐予他们关注与慷慨，这让他们感到非常荣幸。{/n}“织血罗网不敢拒绝秘者的好意，这是冒犯之举。”

languages.text: 「私たちの物ではないものは求めていけない。世俗的な欲望を押し殺さなければならない。故に教義は我らを導き、故に我らは教義に従う。しかし…」{n}キベラの声は落ち着いていたが、他の教団メンバーに興奮の波紋が広がっているのに気づく。彼らは明らかに、自由開拓者に注目されている事を、光栄に思っている。{/n}「ブラッドスパン・ウェブはドミンを拒否することで、不快感を与えることはないと思います」
languages.original_text: "We must not seek that which is not ours. We must smother our worldly desires. Thus do the Tenets guide us, and thus we follow them. However..." {n}Kibellah's voice remains calm, but you notice a ripple of excitement pass through the other cult members. They are clearly flattered to be the subject of the Rogue Trader's attention and generosity.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web would not dare to cause offence by refusing the Domin."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちの物ではないものは求めていけない。世俗的な欲望を押し殺さなければならない。故に教義は我らを導き、故に我らは教義に従う。しかし…」{n}キベラの声は落ち着いていたが、他の教団メンバーに興奮の波紋が広がっているのに気づく。彼らは明らかに、自由開拓者に注目されている事を、光栄に思っている。{/n}「ブラッドスパン・ウェブはドミンを拒否することで、不快感を与えることはないと思います」

languages.text: "Wir dürfen nicht nach dem streben, was nicht unser ist. Wir müssen unsere weltlichen Begierden unterdrücken. Das lehren uns die Grundsätze und deshalb folgen wir ihnen. Allerdings ..." {n}Kibellahs Stimme bleibt ruhig, aber du bemerkst eine gewisse Aufregung bei den anderen Mitgliedern des Kultes. Sie fühlen sich sichtlich geschmeichelt, die Aufmerksamkeit und Großzügigkeit {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu genießen.{/n} "Das Blutgesponnene Netz würde es nicht wagen, {mf|den|die} Domin zu beleidigen, indem wir uns wiedersetzen."
languages.original_text: "We must not seek that which is not ours. We must smother our worldly desires. Thus do the Tenets guide us, and thus we follow them. However..." {n}Kibellah's voice remains calm, but you notice a ripple of excitement pass through the other cult members. They are clearly flattered to be the subject of the Rogue Trader's attention and generosity.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web would not dare to cause offence by refusing the Domin."

languages.text: "Bizim olmayanın peşine düşmemiz yasaktır. Dünyevi arzularımızı bastırmamız gerekir. İlkeler bize bunu öğretir, biz de buna uyarız. Ancak..." {n}Kibellah'nın sesi soğukkanlılığını korusa da diğer tarikatçılar arasında bir heyecan dalgası oluştuğunu fark ediyorsun. Hür Tacir'in onlara ilgi ve cömertlik göstermesi, gururlarını okşamış olsa gerek.{/n} "Kanipi Ağı, Dominini geri çevirerek gücendirmeye cüret edemez."
languages.original_text: "We must not seek that which is not ours. We must smother our worldly desires. Thus do the Tenets guide us, and thus we follow them. However..." {n}Kibellah's voice remains calm, but you notice a ripple of excitement pass through the other cult members. They are clearly flattered to be the subject of the Rogue Trader's attention and generosity.{/n} "The Bloodspun Web would not dare to cause offence by refusing the Domin."
